attributes.action: Stop children suffering and make all council adoption agencies adopt the same principles as Catholic adoption agencies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Council adoption agencies have a distruption rate of 10%.
Catholic adoption agencies have a distruption rate of 3.6%.
So 6.4% MORE ORPHANS SUFFER the emotional stress and trauma, of family breakup if they go through Council adoption.  This is UNACCEPTABLE IN A CIVILISED SOCIETY!!! 

[1] Ivaldi, G (1998) Children adopted from Care, Key Findings. London: BAAF. Pg 7.

AND All Catholic adoption agencies should be exempted from being closed under new equal rights legislation.
